title: How to Enable Dark Mode on Android Messages

steps.title: Launch Android “Messages” app on your device.
steps.content: Launch Android “Messages” app on your device. It’s the blue icon with a white text box, typically found on the home screen or in the app drawer. Make sure that your app is up to date. If it's not, go to the Google Play Store and update the app.

steps.title: Tap on the ⋮ menu.
steps.content: Tap on the ⋮ menu. You will see the three dots menu at the top right of the app.

steps.title: Tap on Enable dark mode.
steps.content: Tap on Enable dark mode . It will be the fourth option in the list.

steps.title: Watch the Messages app's interface darken.
steps.content: Watch the Messages app's interface darken. If you want to turn off this feature, just Tap on the Disable dark mode option in the same menu. That's it!
